name: Ludum Dare 46 Entry
description:
The king is hungry and we are out of food! The king must be fed to keep this village alive! He seems to like that goo the egg people produce! Looks like we need to keep these egg people entertained and well fed! Whatever we do we can't let the king die. You're job is simple, KEEP THE KING ALIVE.

TIP : If you run out of green eggs right click on open grass to plant a green egg.

FYI - Eggs love muffins!!
